charges.charge_description: 18:1326(a)&;(b)(1) ILLEGAL REENTRY BY ALIEN INTO THE UNITED STATES WITHOUT THE PERMISSION FROM THE ATTORNEY GENERAL OF THE UNITED STATES AND/OR THE SECRETARY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF HOMELAND SECURITY(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to time served in federal custody plus 10 days; No supervised release - deportation anticipated following terms of imprisonment; $100.00 special assessment (remitted on motion of USA)
